      • stopDiscovery

        public void stopDiscovery(edu.harvard.integer.common.discovery.DiscoveryId discoverId)
                   throws edu.harvard.integer.common.exception.IntegerException
        Description copied from interface: DiscoveryManagerInterface
        Stop the discovery for the given discoveryId. If the discovery is not found then an exception will be thrown. NOTE: this invokes the stop. The discovery may still be running for a short time after this call returns to clean up.
        Specified by:
        stopDiscovery in interface DiscoveryManagerInterface
        Throws:
        edu.harvard.integer.common.exception.IntegerException
